transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hmm kya keh rahe the aap?
Customer: 10 January ko katao tha.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello. Yes, this is Jaya Kumari speaking from Srija Multiproof Processing.
Executive: Uh, ma'am, you, I am Shailja from IndiaMART head office. Have you called on IndiaMART customer care number?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Uh, okay. May I know the concern why you called on customer care number, ma'am?
Customer: Actually, I just want buyers of black turmeric.
Executive: Ma'am, your voice is not audible to me. Hello. Hello. Is it, is it now okay?
Customer: Yeah, now it's clear. Tell me.
Executive: Actually, I said here regarding of buyers, uh, we have a crop of seven acres, uh, regarding of black turmeric, black turmeric buyers I need. So somehow one of my friend guided me, you can contact to this number that they can guide you whether yeah, they will have buyers as well, they will guide you like.
Executive: Okay, yeah. So may I know the which company, which buyer name you want to know on IndiaMART?
Customer: Actually, we have a raw crop, black turmeric.
Executive: Black turmeric, okay.
Customer: So I need buyers for that particular product.
Executive: Black turmeric, you want to know how the buyer who is dealing in that product line, right? Black turmeric.
Customer: Yes. Yes, I guess. Okay, so you are
Executive: Okay. And one thing I also want to know that there is variety of black turmeric. So you are dealing in black turmeric powder or the raw black turmeric?
Customer: Raw turmeric. We have a crop. Raw.
Executive: Okay. We have a crop of seven acres. Okay. So we have already exhaust raw material of black turmeric. So if is there any buyer, I just want to sell that raw turmeric for them.
Executive: Yeah, ma'am, there are many buyer for black turmeric. So may I know which area you want to sell? You want to sell in Andhra Pradesh or which means south or
Customer: Anywhere, anywhere all over India anywhere. I just need a genuine buyer, that's enough.
Executive: Okay, so ma'am, for that you need to do one thing. You have to go to Google. You can search there black turmeric supplier, right? Or buyer. Then you will be able to find out the companies who is dealing in black turmeric. So there is one company Harbaveda Overseas. It's a New Delhi based company, right? And in Andhra Pradesh
Executive: Let me tell you one minute.
Executive: Actually that concern you raised on seventh, right? So from seventh of November I am trying to connect on your both of the number but no one is answering. So that's the reason.
Executive: Yeah, ma'am, there is one company Sunshine Industries. Okay. The company it's MP based company Indore. Sunshineseelshort.com. They are dealing in kalonji seeds and they are the wholesaler distributor of black turmeric.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: So you can message on those companies. I guess I will go through with Google and I will see the contact. Okay, what I'll do, you have the WhatsApp on this number on which I am talking to you right now?
Customer: No, no, I just tell you my WhatsApp number, you can contact me on that.
Executive: Okay, please provide me your number, ma'am.
Customer: 766
Executive: 766
Customer: 199
Executive: 199
Customer: 5250
Executive: Five 50. I'm repeating the number 7661995250, right?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Your name is Jaya Kumari, right?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay, what I'll do, I will save your number and I'll share you the company who is dealing, who are the buyers of black turmeric, theek hai? And also I am the relationship manager of your company, right? Who is handling the promotion. And one boy is there Vivek. So Vivek is handling your company promotion. So you will save my number, okay? So in case in future if you want to know anything related to your services of IndiaMART or anything related to IndiaMART, just call on my number only. This is my official number, okay?
Customer: No, I am talking with main gauri se baat karte the.
Executive: Haan, gauri se baat karte the na ma'am aap to. Gauri ka dusre department mein transfer ho gaya and gauri ki jagah ek ladka aaya hai Vivek Kumar. Gauri meri hi team mein thi ma'am. Main Shailja baat kar rahi hoon.
Executive: Okay. To gauri ki jagah ab Vivek aapka promotion handle karenge aur aap mera ye number save karke rakh lijiye. In case aapko koi bhi problem hoti hai aap mujhe coordinate karenge. Theek hai ma'am?
Customer: Definitely, definitely. Mujhe dusri call kar sakte ho aap.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko. Haan haan main aapko whatsapp dal deti hoon aur aap aapko na aapke concern ke regarding ek feedback jayega us pe yes reply kar dijiyega please.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants buyers for black turmeric.



Resolution:

- Executive provided details of black turmeric buyers.

- Executive shared details of relationship manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share company details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyers, black turmeric, promotion, relationship manager
